# easybio

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

You can install the development version of easybio from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("snowGlint/easybio")
```

To know how to use this package, please see the [wiki](https://github.com/snowGlint/easybio/wiki).
